OOC: I'm really, really sorry for not posting in such a long time! I 
can't even blame it on the power blackout, I'm in Quebec! I just work 
as hell these days...

Bic:

Dreadplague: Right... You think we should call Cybertron or try to 
make some of them ourselves? Unless you wanna get busy at soemthing 
else...
